name: Discuva
body:
## Welcome to Discuva.
This simple application was built by [Trikyas](https://github.com/trikyas) (me) as apart of a tutorial on [Lynda.com](https://www.lynda.com/Flask-tutorials/Learning-Flask/521231-2.html). by [Lalith Polepeddi](https://www.lynda.com/Lalith-Polepeddi/8497044-1.html). Which covers a basic grounding in the fundamental concepts of web development, as well as the hands-on experience required to successfully build web apps with Flask. It also covers the deployment of the application using Heroku. 

### What is Discuva?
Discuva is an Application that let's you find new places around you. With this app you can find places you like, and discover new points of interest wherever you are.


### Want to help?
If you want to make this App better. Please feel free! Clone this repository and fork me baby!

### First clone this repo by running:

`git clone git@github.com:trikyas/discuva.git`

###Using the GitHub branch menu
Alternatively, you can use GitHub's web interface to view each checkpoint. Click on the branch menu and select the checkpoint you want to view, shown below:
![branch menu](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/c77ee7a2722b9cff50bf27424fb34b1bf3211e58/68747470733a2f2f7261772e6769746875622e636f6d2f6c706f6c6570656464692f696e74726f2d746f2d666c61736b2f6d61737465722f696e74726f5f746f5f666c61736b2f7374617469632f696d672f6272616e63682d6d656e752e706e67)

### Authors and Contributors
[Trikyas](https://github.com/trikyas) built this App, by following a tutorial by [Lalith Polepeddi](https://github.com/lpolepeddi). Go to [Learning Flask](https://github.com/lpolepeddi/learning-flask) on gihub and check it out!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything? Create an [Issue](https://github.com/trikyas/discuva/issues) or [contact me](https://github.com/trikyas) and Iâ€™ll try and help you sort it out.
